document.full_text: a car bomber killed more than 20 people and wounded 80 on thursday at a police building in the mainly shi'ite city of hilla, an official said, as iraq braced for revenge attacks after u.s. commandos killed osama bin laden.
document.title: suicide car bomber kills more than 20 in iraq
lines_and_colors: a car bomber killed more than 20 people and wounded 80 on thursday at a police building in the mainly shi'ite city of hilla, an official said, as iraq braced for revenge attacks after u.s. commandos killed osama bin laden.
